statements: SELECT id, customer_id, marketing_campaign, campaign_date FROM Marketing_CRM_Integration;
SELECT customer_id, marketing_campaign, campaign_date, id FROM Marketing_CRM_Integration;
SELECT marketing_campaign, customer_id, campaign_date, id FROM Marketing_CRM_Integration;
SELECT customer_id, campaign_date, marketing_campaign, id FROM Marketing_CRM_Integration;
SELECT id, marketing_campaign, customer_id, campaign_date FROM Marketing_CRM_Integration;
SELECT * FROM Marketing_CRM_Integration WHERE customer_id = 100 ORDER BY campaign_date DESC;
SELECT customer_id, marketing_campaign FROM Marketing_CRM_Integration WHERE campaign_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-05-31';
SELECT id, customer_id, marketing_campaign, campaign_date FROM Marketing_CRM_Integration WHERE id > 5 AND customer_id < 50 ORDER BY id DESC, campaign_date ASC;
SELECT DISTINCT marketing_campaign FROM Marketing_CRM_Integration WHERE customer_id IN (20, 30, 40) ORDER BY marketing_campaign;
SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_campaigns, MAX(campaign_date) AS latest_campaign_date FROM Marketing_CRM_Integration WHERE customer_id = 200;
SELECT * FROM marketing_data;
SELECT customer_id, email, marketing_campaign FROM marketing_data WHERE purchased_product = 'Shoes';
SELECT first_name, last_name, email FROM crm_system WHERE first_name LIKE 'J%';
SELECT id, phone_number FROM marketing_data ORDER BY id DESC;
SELECT customer_id, email, phone_number FROM marketing_data WHERE marketing_campaign = 'Summer Sale' ORDER BY customer_id ASC;
SELECT customer_id, email, phone_number FROM marketing_data;
SELECT * FROM crm_system WHERE first_name = 'John';
SELECT customer_id, last_name, email FROM crm_system ORDER BY last_name DESC;
SELECT COUNT(DISTINCT customer_id) AS total_customers FROM marketing_data WHERE purchased_product = 'Smartphone';
SELECT first_name, last_name, phone_number, email FROM crm_system WHERE email LIKE '%@example.com';
SELECT * FROM customers;
SELECT first_name, last_name FROM customers ORDER BY last_name, first_name;
SELECT customer_id, email FROM customers WHERE customer_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM marketing_campaigns WHERE end_date > NOW();
SELECT interaction_id, customer_id, campaign_id, interaction_date FROM interactions ORDER BY interaction_date DESC;
SELECT customer_id, first_name, last_name FROM customers;
SELECT * FROM marketing_campaigns WHERE budget > 5000;
SELECT customer_id, COUNT(interaction_id) AS total_interactions FROM interactions GROUP BY customer_id;
SELECT campaign_name, start_date, end_date FROM marketing_campaigns ORDER BY start_date DESC;
SELECT customer_id, interaction_type FROM interactions WHERE interaction_type = 'click';
SELECT * FROM marketing_data;
SELECT customer_id, campaign_name, conversion_event FROM marketing_data WHERE conversion_date = '2022-01-05';
SELECT customer_id, first_name, last_name, email FROM customer_profile ORDER BY last_name ASC;
SELECT customer_id, lead_status, last_contact_date, next_followup_date FROM crm_system WHERE lead_status = 'Qualified' ORDER BY customer_id DESC;
SELECT id, customer_id, activity_type, activity_date, activity_description FROM user_activity WHERE customer_id = 1001 AND activity_type LIKE '%Login%' ORDER BY activity_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM marketing_data ORDER BY campaign_name DESC, conversion_date ASC LIMIT 10;
SELECT customer_id, conversion_event FROM marketing_data WHERE conversion_date > '2022-01-01' AND conversion_date < '2022-12-31';
SELECT customer_id, first_name, last_name, email FROM customer_profile WHERE phone_number LIKE '%123%' ORDER BY customer_id ASC;
SELECT * FROM crm_system WHERE lead_status = 'Qualified' AND next_followup_date < NOW();
SELECT id, activity_type, activity_date FROM user_activity WHERE customer_id = 123 ORDER BY activity_date DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT * FROM marketing_data;
SELECT customer_id, email FROM marketing_data ORDER BY customer_id DESC;
SELECT phone_number, email FROM marketing_data WHERE email LIKE '%@gmail.com';
SELECT customer_id, COUNT(*) AS total_interactions FROM customer_interactions GROUP BY customer_id;
SELECT segment_name, segment_description FROM customer_segments WHERE segment_name = 'VIP';
SELECT * FROM marketing_data ORDER BY customer_id DESC LIMIT 5
SELECT email, phone_number FROM marketing_data WHERE email LIKE '%@gmail.com'
SELECT * FROM marketing_data JOIN customer_contacts ON marketing_data.customer_id = customer_contacts.customer_id WHERE customer_contacts.contact_method = 'Email'
SELECT customer_id, segment_name FROM customer_segments WHERE segment_name = 'VIP'
SELECT marketing_campaign, COUNT(*) AS total_customers FROM marketing_data GROUP BY marketing_campaign ORDER BY total_customers DESC
